original: nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te /
translated: Their afflictions will increase greatly.

original: de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las gang dang gang brtsams pa de dag thams cad mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las gang dang gang brtsams pa de dag thams cad mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, because their thoughts are mistaken, whatever actions they undertake in thought, word, or deed will all be unwholesome, ugly, and unpleasant.

original: de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur /
translated: In this way, the great hells will increase.

original: byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dvags kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dvags kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te /
translated: The animal realms, the world of Yama, and the world of hungry ghosts will also increase.

original: bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas /
translated: The realm of Māra will also greatly increase.

original: kun dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong bas bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / tshim @52a * //
analyzed: kun dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong bas bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / tshim @52a * //
translated: Ānanda, seeing this truth, the evil Māra will be delighted, joyful, and content,

original: pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and will experience mental satisfaction.”🔽“Excellent, excellent, Ānanda!

original: kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi /
analyzed: kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi /
translated: “Moreover, Ānanda, if a person belonging to the Bodhisattva Vehicle and a person belonging to the Śrāvaka Vehicle should dispute, saying, ‘I am superior,

original: khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na /
analyzed: khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na /
translated: you are not,’

original: de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: then Māra the wicked one thinks,

original: kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa ste /
analyzed: kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa ste /
translated: ‘This son of a good family is far from the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: He is not near to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'thab mo dang / 'khrug pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te //🔽de ni sems can dmyal ba pa'i lam mo //🔽de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo //
analyzed: 'thab mo dang / 'khrug pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te // de ni sems can dmyal ba pa'i lam mo // de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo //
translated: Because quarreling, fighting, disputing, and arguing are not the path to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽This is the path to the hells.🔽This is the path to the animal realms.

original: de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo //
analyzed: de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo //
translated: This is the path to the world of Yama.

original: de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is not the path to omniscience.’

original: kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'bru na de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'bru na de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: “Moreover, Ānanda, when individuals who are followers of the vehicle of the bodhisattvas quarrel, fight, argue, and find fault with each other, Māra the evil one thinks,

original: 'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o //
translated: ‘These two are far from omniscience.

original: 'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: 'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: Neither of these two will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin /
translated: The path that these two sons of noble family have embarked on is not the path to omniscience.

original: rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “Son of a good family, these two have set out on the path to the hells, the animal world, and the world of Yama.”

original: kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'bru na /
analyzed: kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'bru na /
translated: “Moreover, Ānanda, if a bodhisattva who has not been predicted to full enlightenment should think ill of a bodhisattva who has been predicted, and should quarrel with, dispute with, argue with, and find fault with him,

original: gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtong zhe na /
analyzed: gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtong zhe na /
translated: if he does not give up the knowledge of all modes,

original: ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang 'khrug cing mtshang 'bru bar gyur pa de srid du bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang 'khrug cing mtshang 'bru bar gyur pa de srid du bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o //
translated: to that extent he should gird on the armor for as many eons as he has produced thoughts of ill will, quarreled, disputed, argued, and found fault.

original: kun dga' @52b bos gsol pa /
analyzed: kun dga' @52b bos gsol pa /
translated: Ānanda said:

original: bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam /
translated: Blessed One, do those thoughts of awakening have another origin,

original: 'on te ma lags kyis bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo 'tshal /
analyzed: 'on te ma lags kyis bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo 'tshal /
translated: or must they be armored for just that many eons?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang ; rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te /
analyzed: kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang ; rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te /
translated: “Ānanda, I have taught the Dharma with its origin for those in the vehicle of the hearers, for those in the vehicle of the solitary buddhas, and for those in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas.

original: kun dga' bo de la gang zag de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'thab cing rtsod la /🔽gshe pa'i mi snyan pa brjod pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang / mi snyan pa brjod pa byas nas /
analyzed: kun dga' bo de la gang zag de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'thab cing rtsod la / gshe pa'i mi snyan pa brjod pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang / mi snyan pa brjod pa byas nas /
translated: Ānanda, in that regard, if a person in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas argues with and disputes a person in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas,🔽and if, after arguing, disputing, and speaking unpleasantly,

original: phyir mi 'chags par mdud par 'dzin zhing 'khon du bzung ste gnas na /
analyzed: phyir mi 'chags par mdud par 'dzin zhing 'khon du bzung ste gnas na /
translated: they do not confess their faults, hold grudges, and remain resentful,

original: kun dga' bo de la gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smra ste /
analyzed: kun dga' bo de la gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smra ste /
translated: Ānanda, I do not say that such a person will appear.

original: gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtong zhe na ;
analyzed: gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtong zhe na ;
translated: If that person does not give up the knowledge of all aspects,

original: gdon mi za bar bskal ba de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar bskal ba de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o //
translated: then without a doubt he or she will have to don the armor for that many eons.

original: kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thab cing rtsod de /
analyzed: kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thab cing rtsod de /
translated: Ānanda, if a bodhisattva great being, while fighting, arguing,

original: gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod par gyur na yang mdud par mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod par gyur na yang mdud par mi 'dzin la /
translated: getting angry, and saying uncomplimentary things, does not hold a grudge,

original: phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin zhing bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste /
analyzed: phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin zhing bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste /
translated: and if he or she vows to refrain from such actions in the future, thinking, ‘I have done wrong in trying to get what I want,

original: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na /
analyzed: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na /
translated: and I must remove the suffering of all sentient beings. But I have spoken back to them and turned them away.

original: de ltar bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir bzlog pa ni mi tshul gyis bdag gis de ltar mi bya'i /
analyzed: de ltar bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir bzlog pa ni mi tshul gyis bdag gis de ltar mi bya'i /
translated: I must not act like this. I must not say uncomplimentary things about others and turn them away.

original: bdag gis glan pa dang lkugs pa bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis glan pa dang lkugs pa bzhin du bya'o //
translated: I will be like a mute or a deaf person.

original: bdag gis bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o //🔽sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: bdag gis bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o // sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: I will not be disturbed in my thoughts.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya dgos na /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya dgos na /
translated: I must fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening for the sake of these sentient beings and then lead them to complete nirvāṇa.

original: de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis /
analyzed: de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis /
translated: It would not be right for me to be malevolent toward them, or to be disturbed by them.

original: bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o //
translated: I will not be malevolent toward them.

original: bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na /🔽kun dga' bo byang chub @53a * //
analyzed: bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na / kun dga' bo byang chub @53a * //
translated: I will not be disturbed by them.’

original: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de /
analyzed: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de /
translated: Ānanda, I declare that bodhisattva great beings

original: de la bdud sdig can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do //
analyzed: de la bdud sdig can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do //
translated: who think like that will have an appearance, and that even Māra the wicked one, looking for an opportunity, will not get an opportunity.

original: kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o //🔽de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o // de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Ānanda, bodhisattva mahāsattvas should not associate with those who are followers of the Śrāvakayāna.🔽They should not live with them.

original: 'dug par mi bya'o //🔽gal te 'dug na yang des su la gnod sems su mi bya /
analyzed: 'dug par mi bya'o // gal te 'dug na yang des su la gnod sems su mi bya /
translated: They should not stay with them.

original: 'khrug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'khrug par mi bya'o //
translated: If they do stay with them, they should not be malicious or angry with them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la mi tshul lo //
analyzed: gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la mi tshul lo //
translated: Because it is not right for me to be malicious or angry with those whom I should liberate from all suffering,🔽having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because I should liberate them from all suffering, having fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bdun pa yin no /🔽// / bam po lnga bcu bzhi pa /
analyzed: sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bdun pa yin no / // / bam po lnga bcu bzhi pa /
translated: This is the seventh increase.

original: kun dga' bos gsol pa /
analyzed: kun dga' bos gsol pa /
translated: Ānanda said,🔽“Lord, how should bodhisattva mahāsattvas train in the perfection of wisdom?”

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi /
translated: “Blessed One, how should bodhisattva great beings relate to other bodhisattvas?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Ānanda, it is like this:

original: ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings should relate to other bodhisattvas as teachers.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o //
translated: They are my companions, fellow travelers.

original: 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o //
translated: I should train just as they do.

original: 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: They have trained in the perfection of generosity, the perfection of discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of insight.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
translated: the perfection of wisdom, the emptiness of all, the factors of awakening, the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa @53b dang ; smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa @53b dang ; smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang /
translated: the liberations, the serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, the higher perceptions, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ; rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do //
translated: “I too should train in that very thing in which the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas have trained, are training, and will train; in which the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas have trained, are training, and will train; and in which the bodhisattvas have trained, are training, and will train.

original: des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste /
translated: “He should also arouse this thought:

original: 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa ste /
translated: ‘This is the teaching of the path to perfect complete awakening.

original: gal te des 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na /
analyzed: gal te des 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na /
translated: If, while practicing in combination, I were to be separated from the attention endowed with the knowledge of path,

original: de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i /
analyzed: de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i /
translated: I should not train in that.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas na /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas na /
translated: “If those bodhisattva great beings are not separated from the attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de /
translated: then I too should train like that.”

original: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa nyams pa yin no //
translated: The bodhisattva great beings who train like that are defective in their training.”

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags /
translated: “Lord, what is the sameness of bodhisattva great beings in which bodhisattva great beings should train?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: “Subhūti, inner emptiness is the sameness of bodhisattva great beings.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the external is the sameness of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the external and internal is the sameness of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is the sameness of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /
translated: Form is empty of form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are empty of consciousness.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni @54a * //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni @54a * //
translated: The sense fields, elements, and dependent origination

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas stong /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas stong /
translated: are empty of dependent origination.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis stong /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis stong /
translated: the perfections, all the emptinesses, and the dharmas on the side of awakening are empty of the dharmas on the side of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang ; gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas stong /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang ; gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas stong /
translated: The noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the deliverances, and the serial absorptions are empty of the serial absorptions.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ; gzungs kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgos stong /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ; gzungs kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgos stong /
translated: The emptiness, signless, and wishless gateways, and the dhāraṇī gateways are empty of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas stong /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas stong /
translated: The powers, fearlessnesses, detailed and thorough knowledges, and distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects is empty of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: Subhūti, this is the sameness of bodhisattva great beings.🔽Abiding in it, bodhisattva great beings fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba brgyad pa yin no /🔽// / gsol pa /
analyzed: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba brgyad pa yin no / // / gsol pa /
translated: This is the eighth enhancement.🔽Subhūti then asked,

original: bcom ldan 'das ci lags /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ci lags / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
translated: “Lord,🔽if bodhisattva great beings train in order to wear out form, do they train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: If they train in order to free form from attachment, do they train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: If one trains in order to cause form to cease, does one train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
translated: If one trains in order to cause form not to arise, does one train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: If one trains in order to cause feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness to cease, does one train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
translated: If one trains in order to cause consciousness to be without attachment, does one train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: rnam par shes pa @54b 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa @54b 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: If one trains in order to cause consciousness to cease, does one train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: If one trains in order to cause consciousness not to arise, does one train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: “If one trains in order to perfect the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination, is that training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang / 'gag par bgyi ba dang / mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang / 'gag par bgyi ba dang / mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: “If one trains in order to be free from attachment, to cease, and to not arise, is that training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
translated: “If one trains in all the perfections, all the emptinesses, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, and the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang /
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad bas par bgyi ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang / 'gag par bgyi ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad bas par bgyi ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang / 'gag par bgyi ba dang /
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽and to train in the knowledge of all aspects in order to complete, become free from attachment to, and cease them,

original: mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: and in order to make them non-arisen?”🔽“

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bas par bgyi ba dang ; 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang / 'gag par bgyi ba dang / mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bas par bgyi ba dang ; 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang / 'gag par bgyi ba dang / mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam /
translated: If one trains in order to exhaust, to become free from attachment, to cease, and to not produce, up to and including the knowledge of all aspects, does one train in the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ni ma yin no //
translated: “No, Subhūti, one does not.”

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gang 'di skad du gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gang 'di skad du gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
translated: The elder Subhūti said, “If one trains in order to exhaust form, does one train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
translated: If one trains in order to become free from attachment to form, does one train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams @55a * //
analyzed: gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams @55a * //
translated: If one trains in order to cause form to cease,

original: cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
translated: does one train in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gzugs mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam /🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /🔽rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: gzugs mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin nam / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam / rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
translated: If they train in order to stop form, are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?🔽If they train in order to end feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness, are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?🔽If they train in order to free feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness from desire, are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
translated: If they train in order to stop feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness, are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
translated: If they train in order to stop form, are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?🔽If they train in order to stop feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness, are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zad par bya ba dang / 'gag par bya ba dang mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zad par bya ba dang / 'gag par bya ba dang mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
translated: “If they train in order to end, stop, and not produce the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination, are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
translated: “If they train in order to end, stop, and not produce all the perfections, all the emptinesses, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the four noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang /
translated: the deliverances, the complete conquerings, the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad zad par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang / 'gag par bya ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad zad par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang / 'gag par bya ba dang /
translated: “If one trains in order to cause the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha to be exhausted, to be separated from defilement, to cease, and not to arise,

original: mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
analyzed: mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam /
translated: is one training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zad par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang / 'gag par bya ba dang / mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam zhes smras pa de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zad par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang / 'gag par bya ba dang / mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam zhes smras pa de ni ma yin no //
translated: “If one trains in order to cause the knowledge of all aspects to be exhausted, to be separated from defilement, to cease, and not to arise, is one training in the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: gzugs @55b kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs @55b kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: the suchness of the sense fields, elements, and dependent origination,🔽the suchness of the perfections,🔽the suchness of all the emptinesses,🔽the suchness of the thirty-seven aspects of awakening,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: the suchness of the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: It is the suchness of the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, and the formless absorptions. It is the suchness of the aspects of complete liberation, the serial steps of meditative absorption, emptiness, signlessness,🔽and aspirationlessness. It is the suchness of the superknowledges, the meditative stabilities, and the dhāraṇī gateways. It is the suchness of the powers, the fearlessnesses, the aspects of correct understanding,

original: smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
translated: and the unique qualities of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas zhes brjod pa'i de bzhin nyid de dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas zhes brjod pa'i de bzhin nyid de dang /
translated: the suchness of the tathāgatas,🔽the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects,🔽the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am /🔽spang ba'am / skye ba'am /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am / spang ba'am / skye ba'am /
translated: the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects up to the knowledge of all aspects,🔽is exhausted,🔽abandoned,🔽arisen,

original: 'gag par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: 'gag par 'gyur ram /
translated: or ceased?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so //
translated: He replied, “No, Lord.

original: bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so //
translated: No, Sugata.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that train in suchness,

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob ste /
translated: and train in the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: and train in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de bzhin nyid ni zad pa'am /🔽spang ba'am / skye ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni zad pa'am / spang ba'am / skye ba'am /
translated: the real nature is not exhausted,🔽is not abandoned,🔽is not produced, and

original: 'gag par 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: 'gag par 'gyur ba med de /
translated: is not stopped.

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste /🔽rnam pa thams @56a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste / rnam pa thams @56a * //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that train in the real nature,

original: cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: train in the knowledge of all aspects,🔽and train in the six perfections.🔽Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that train in all the emptinesses,🔽train in the applications of mindfulness,

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin /
translated: train in the right efforts,🔽train in the legs of miraculous power,🔽train in the faculties,🔽train in the powers,🔽train in the limbs of awakening,🔽train in the path,🔽train in the noble truths,🔽train in the formless absorptions,🔽train in the eight deliverances,🔽train in the nine serial absorptions,🔽train in the ten wholehearted practices,🔽train in the dhāraṇī gateways,🔽train in the emptiness gateway,🔽train in the signless gateway,🔽train in the wishless gateway,🔽train in the emptiness of internal phenomena,🔽train in the emptiness of external phenomena,🔽train in the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena,🔽train in the emptiness of emptiness,🔽train in the emptiness of great extent,🔽train in the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽train in the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽train in the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽train in the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽train in the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,🔽train in the emptiness of nonrepudiation,🔽train in the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: stong pa nyid thams cad la slob pa yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad la slob pa yin /
translated: train in the emptiness of all phenomena,🔽train in the emptiness of nonexistents,🔽train in the emptiness of existent phenomena,🔽train in the emptiness of nonentities,🔽train in the emptiness of entities,🔽train in the emptiness of essential nature,🔽train in the emptiness of other entities,🔽train in the perfection of giving,🔽train in the perfection of morality,🔽train in the perfection of patience,🔽train in the perfection of perseverance,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob pa yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob pa yin /
translated: train in the perfection of concentration,🔽train in the perfection of wisdom,🔽train in the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,🔽train in the ten powers of the tathāgatas,🔽train in the four fearlessnesses,🔽train in the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin /
translated: train in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob pa yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob pa yin /
translated: train in the knowledge of all aspects,🔽train in the knowledge of path

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob pa yin /🔽rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la slob pa yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob pa yin / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in the concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, and the formless absorptions.🔽They train in the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.🔽

original: mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo la slob pa yin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo la slob pa yin /
translated: they train in the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, and the five eyes;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad la slob pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad la slob pa yin /
translated: they train in the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin /
translated: they train in the knowledge of all aspects up to the knowledge of all aspects;

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that will reach the perfection of all trainings.”🔽“Lord, what is the perfection of all trainings?”

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud dam /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud dam /
translated: Subhuti : Thus trained, the Bodhisattva, the great being, will not be afraid when he has entered on a Bodhisattva's way of salvation.🔽

original: bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis pham par mi nus pa yin /
analyzed: bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis pham par mi nus pa yin /
translated: Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being who trains thus, will not be overcome by Mara, or by the gods of Mara's host.

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa yin /
translated: Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being who trains thus, will quickly reach the irreversible stage.

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gi pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gi pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin /
translated: Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being who trains thus, will course in the Tathagata's way of life.

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mgon du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mgon du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la slob pa yin /
translated: Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being who trains thus, will train in the dharmas which are a protection.

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la slob pa yin /
translated: Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being who trains thus, will train in great love and great compassion.

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs @56b rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs @56b rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin /
translated: Subhuti: Thus trained, the Bodhisattva, the great being, trains in the purification of the Buddha-field.

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin /
translated: Thus trained, the Bodhisattva, the great being, trains in the maturing of beings.

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin /
translated: Thus trained, the Bodhisattva, the great being, trains in the turning of the wheel of Dharma which has three revolutions and twelve aspects.

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir slob pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir slob pa yin /
translated: Thus trained, the Bodhisattva, the great being, trains in the continuity of the lineage of the Tathagatas.

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'chi ba med pa'i sgo dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'chi ba med pa'i sgo dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin /
translated: Thus trained, the Bodhisattva, the great being, trains in the opening of the door of the immortal.

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o zhes slob pa yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o zhes slob pa yin te /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who train like that train in the teaching of the uncompounded realm.

original: rab 'byor sems can dman pas ni bslab pa rgya chen po 'di dag la bslab par mi nus so //
analyzed: rab 'byor sems can dman pas ni bslab pa rgya chen po 'di dag la bslab par mi nus so //
translated: Subhūti, inferior beings are unable to train in these vast trainings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba las gdon par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba las gdon par 'dod pa ste /
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings who train in this training want to liberate all beings from saṃsāra.

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dmyal bar mi skye /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dmyal bar mi skye /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who train like that are not reborn in the hells,

original: byol song gi skye gnas dang // shin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o //
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas dang // shin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o //
translated: are not reborn in the animal world, and are not reborn in the world of Yama.

original: yul mtha' 'khob tu mi skye'o //
analyzed: yul mtha' 'khob tu mi skye'o //
translated: They are not reborn in the borderlands.

original: gdol pa'i rigs su mi skye'o //
analyzed: gdol pa'i rigs su mi skye'o //
translated: They are not reborn in the lowest castes.

original: dma' ba dang dman pa'i spyod pa dang / btsog pa'i rigs rnams su mi skye'o //🔽zhar bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dma' ba dang dman pa'i spyod pa dang / btsog pa'i rigs rnams su mi skye'o // zhar bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They are not reborn in low, inferior, or contemptible castes.🔽They do not become one-eyed.

original: sgur por mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgur por mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not become hunchbacked.

original: zha bor mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zha bor mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not be crippled;

original: yan lag skyon can du mi 'gyur ro //🔽'on par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yan lag skyon can du mi 'gyur ro // 'on par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not be missing any limbs;🔽they will not be deaf;

original: lag pa med par mi 'gyur ro //🔽dbang po dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: lag pa med par mi 'gyur ro // dbang po dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur te /
translated: they will not be missing any hands;🔽they will not be missing any major or minor body parts;

original: dbang po yongs su tshang zhing dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po yongs su tshang zhing dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not be missing any faculties;

original: srog gcod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srog gcod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not kill;

original: ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g-yem par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g-yem par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not steal; they will not engage in sexual misconduct;

original: brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma can dang / tshig rtsub po smra ba dang / tshig kyal pa can dang / brnab sems can dang / gnod sems can dang / log par lta bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽'tsho ba log pas 'tsho bar @57a * //
analyzed: brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma can dang / tshig rtsub po smra ba dang / tshig kyal pa can dang / brnab sems can dang / gnod sems can dang / log par lta bar mi 'gyur ro // 'tsho ba log pas 'tsho bar @57a * //
translated: they will not lie; they will not slander; they will not speak harshly; they will not gossip; they will not be covetous; they will not have ill will; and they will not have wrong views;

original: mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not have wrong livelihood;

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not hold wrong views;

original: tshul khrims ngan pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not have bad ethics;

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye'o //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that do not get reborn among the long-lived gods.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: thabs mkhas pa de dag dang / gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe ring por mi skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de la yod de /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa de dag dang / gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe ring por mi skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de la yod de /
translated: Because they have the skillful means by which bodhisattva great beings do not get reborn among the long-lived gods.

original: de yang gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What are they?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las thabs mkhas pa bstan pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las thabs mkhas pa bstan pa ste /
translated: They are the skillful means taught in this perfection of wisdom itself.

original: thabs mkhas pa de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug / tshad med pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug / tshad med pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings endowed with those skillful means become absorbed in the concentrations, become absorbed in the immeasurables, and become absorbed in the formless absorptions.

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o //🔽rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di lta ste ;
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o // rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di lta ste ;
translated: they are not reborn through the power of the concentrations, the immeasurables, or the formless absorptions.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that will attain the purification of the power of all the buddhadharmas, in that they are purified of the stains of the attention of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na /
translated: ” Subhūti then asked, “Lord, if all phenomena are pure by nature,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang gi yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang gi yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: what is the purification that bodhisattva great beings will attain?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
translated: The Lord replied, “Subhūti,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is so, it is so.

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin no //
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, all phenomena are pure by nature.

original: rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, in that way, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are purifying all dharmas,

original: sems zhum pa med cing 'gong ba med pa de ni rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sems zhum pa med cing 'gong ba med pa de ni rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, that is the perfection of wisdom.

original: byis @57b pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong bas sems can de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
analyzed: byis @57b pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong bas sems can de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
translated: Because all ordinary, foolish beings do not know and do not see that reality, for the sake of those beings, bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
translated: practice the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom,

original: nang stong pa nyid la spyod /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la spyod /
translated: practice inner emptiness,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod /
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod /
translated: They practice the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod /
translated: the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod /
translated: They practice the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, and the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod /
translated: They practice the eight deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod /
translated: the nine serial absorptions, and emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod /
translated: They practice the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sang rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad la spyod /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sang rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad la spyod /
translated: they practice the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod de /
translated: they practice up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur te /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that will attain the power and fearlessness of all dharmas.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo //
translated: They will not fall to the śrāvaka or pratyekabuddha level.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that will reach the other side of the thoughts, conduct, and movements of all beings.”

original: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang / g-yo ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba dgu pa yin no /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang / g-yo ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba dgu pa yin no /
translated: This is the ninth growth.

original: // / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: // / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is just as if there were a great sal tree

original: sa chen po'i phyogs gang na 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi sa le sbram 'byung ba de lta bu ni nyung ngo //🔽rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sa chen po'i phyogs gang na 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi sa le sbram 'byung ba de lta bu ni nyung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste /
translated: the places on the great earth where refined gold from the Jambū River is found are few.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i @58a * //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i @58a * //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, those beings who train in this training in the perfection of wisdom

original: sems can de lta bu yang nyung ste /
analyzed: sems can de lta bu yang nyung ste /
translated: are few.

original: sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: Those beings who will stand on the śrāvaka level🔽or the pratyekabuddha level are far more numerous than that.”

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas sa mang ngo zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bcu pa yin no /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas sa mang ngo zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bcu pa yin no /
translated: This is the tenth increase.

original: // / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /🔽sems can gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta bu ni nyung ste /
analyzed: // / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na / sems can gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta bu ni nyung ste /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:🔽those beings who have taken up and are practicing the karma that will become a wheel-turning king are few.

original: sems can gang khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa de lta bu ni ches mang ngo //
analyzed: sems can gang khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa de lta bu ni ches mang ngo //
translated: Those beings who have taken up and are practicing the karma that will become a minor king of a region are far more numerous than that.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu yang nyung ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu yang nyung ste /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, those beings who enter this path to the knowledge of all modes are few,

original: sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: but those beings who will stand on the level of a śrāvaka

original: rang sang rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo //
analyzed: rang sang rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo //
translated: or on the level of a pratyekabuddha are even more numerous than that.

original: rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de
analyzed: rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de
translated: “Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who have set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening are even fewer than those bodhisattva great beings who practice as they have been taught.

original: lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //🔽de bas kyang sems can gang nyan thos sam /
analyzed: lta bu ni ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang sems can gang nyan thos sam /
translated: Those are even fewer than that.🔽Even more numerous than that are those beings who will stand on the level of a śrāvaka

original: rang sangs rgyas su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo //
translated: or on the level of a pratyekabuddha.”

original: rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing the tshom med par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon pa de dag pas ni gang phyir mi ldog🔽pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de lta bu ches mang ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing the tshom med par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon pa de dag pas ni gang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de lta bu ches mang ngo //
translated: “Subhūti, those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who practice this deep perfection of wisdom without doubt and who have reached the irreversible level are more numerous than those who have not reached the irreversible level.🔽“Subhūti, therefore bodhisattva great beings who want to reach the irreversible level and who want to enter the irreversible level should train in just this deep perfection of wisdom.”

original: rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sar chud par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bcu gcig pa yin no /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sar chud par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'phel ba bcu gcig pa yin no /
translated: This is the eleventh development.

original: // / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: // / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom

original: ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //
analyzed: ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //
translated: a stingy mind does not arise.

original: tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //🔽'khrugs pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //🔽le lo dang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o //
