analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston zhing ched du brjod pa'ang ched🔽du brjod pa mdzad do //
translated: are practicing in the manner of training in the way of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha Merukūṭa, in a way that delights them and also utter words of appreciation.🔽“Śāriputra

original: rab 'byor gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che tog gi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @69a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che tog gi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @69a * //
translated: Subhūti, the blessed buddhas praise and extol those bodhisattva great beings who practice the bodhisattva way by following the example of the bodhisattva great being Ratnaketu.

original: de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston zhing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
analyzed: de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston zhing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
translated: “Subhūti, the lord buddhas also teach the Dharma to those bodhisattva great beings who practice the bodhisattva practice by way of being a follower of the bodhisattva great being Ratnaketu, and they utter this exclamation of joy.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad skye ba med par mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad skye ba med par mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who practice the perfection of wisdom and have confidence in the nonproduction of all dharmas but have not attained the acceptance that dharmas are not produced,

original: chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad gsog gsob ste rag lus pa'o zhes bya ba dang / snying po med pa'o zhes bya bar mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston zhing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //🔽rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston zhing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni nyan
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad gsog gsob ste rag lus pa'o zhes bya ba dang / snying po med pa'o zhes bya bar mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston zhing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston zhing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni nyan
translated: “All phenomena are empty,” “All phenomena are calm,” “All phenomena are insubstantial, hollow, void, and baseless,” and “All phenomena are essenceless.”

original: thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa spangs pa yin te /
analyzed: thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa spangs pa yin te /
translated: “Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings to whom the lord buddhas teach the Dharma in the manner of proclaiming their names and also proclaim their names are bodhisattva great beings who have abandoned the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang lung bstan pa yin /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang lung bstan pa yin /
translated: and they will also prophesy their unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston zhing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston zhing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, to whom the lord buddhas teach the Dharma by way of proclaiming their names and also make proclamations,

original: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings will stand in irreversible progress,

original: de la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: and standing in that they will reach the knowledge of all aspects.”🔽“Lord, if the perfection of wisdom is not a this or a that,🔽how can the bodhisattva great beings stand in the perfection of wisdom?”🔽“Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings should stand in the perfection of wisdom without taking anything as a basis.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa thos na 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin no zhes🔽ni ma nur med cing the tshom mi za la rmongs par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa thos na 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin no zhes ni ma nur med cing the tshom mi za la rmongs par mi 'gyur na /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings hear the explanation of the profound perfection of wisdom, they will not be uncertain, will not doubt, and will not be confused, thinking, ‘This is just as the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas have explained it.’

original: des ni phyis kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag las thos @69b par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des ni phyis kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag las thos @69b par 'gyur te /
translated: Later, they will hear it from the tathāgata, worthy one, perfectly complete buddha Akṣobhya and from those sons of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du mos pas phyir mi ldog🔽pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du mos pas phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: “Subhūti, those sons of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who have faith in this perfection of wisdom and who have faith in this deep perfection of wisdom just as it has been taught by the Tathāgata will stand in the irreversible state.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa ni phan pa mang por 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa ni phan pa mang por 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Subhūti, it is in that way that the bodhisattva great beings who hear the perfection of wisdom have much benefit.

original: gang gis mos shing mos nas de bzhin nyid du gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni smos kyang ci smos te /
analyzed: gang gis mos shing mos nas de bzhin nyid du gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni smos kyang ci smos te /
translated: What need is there to say more about those who have faith in it and, having faith, stand in suchness and practice in suchness?

original: de dag de bzhin nyid la gnas /
analyzed: de dag de bzhin nyid la gnas /
translated: They stand in suchness.🔽Having stood in suchness and practiced in suchness, they will stand in the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: de bzhin nyid la nan tan du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la nan tan du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: “Lord, if all dharmas are empty of all dharmas, how does the perfection of wisdom surpass the world with its gods, humans, and asuras and stand above, tower over, and overtop it?”🔽“Subhūti, it is because all dharmas are empty of all dharmas that the perfection of wisdom surpasses the world with its gods, humans, and asuras and stands above, towers over, and overtops it.🔽Subhūti, it is because all dharmas are empty of all dharmas that the perfection of wisdom surpasses the world with its gods, humans, and asuras and stands above, towers over, and overtops it.🔽Subhūti, it is because all dharmas are empty of all dharmas that the perfection of wisdom surpasses the world with its gods, humans, and asuras and stands above, towers over, and overtops it.🔽Subhūti, it is because all dharmas are empty of all dharmas that the perfection of wisdom surpasses the world with its gods, humans, and asuras and stands above, towers over, and overtops it.🔽Subhūti, it is because all dharmas are empty of all dharmas that the perfection of wisdom surpasses the world with its gods, humans, and asuras and stands above, towers over, and overtops it.🔽Subhūti, it is because all dharmas are empty of all dharmas that the perfection of wisdom surpasses the world with its gods, humans, and asuras and stands above, towers over, and overtops it.🔽Subhūti, it is because all dharmas are empty of all dharmas that the perfection of wisdom surpasses the world

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid du gnas nas de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyis te /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid du gnas nas de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyis te /
translated: He asked, “Blessed One, if one abides in suchness and practices in suchness,

original: chos gang yang ma dmigs na /
analyzed: chos gang yang ma dmigs na /
translated: but does not observe any phenomena,

original: de ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: de ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: how will one abide in omniscience?

original: bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin nyid las ma gtogs pa'i chos kyang gang yang ma dmigs na su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin nyid las ma gtogs pa'i chos kyang gang yang ma dmigs na su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur /
translated: Blessed One, if no phenomena are observed apart from suchness, who will abide in suchness?

original: de bzhin nyid la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
translated: Who will abide in suchness and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood?

original: su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur /
analyzed: su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur /
translated: Who will abide in suchness and teach the Dharma?”

original: de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su ma mchis na de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su ma mchis na de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: or one who, abiding in suchness, teaches the Dharma, be apprehended?

original: de ni gnas ma mchis so //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de ni gnas ma mchis so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “Subhūti, that is not the case.

original: rab 'byor gang khyod 'di skad du gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par gzhan dmigs su med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor gang khyod 'di skad du gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par gzhan dmigs su med de /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti, you have said, ‘Apart from suchness, I do not apprehend any other dharma that abides in suchness, or that, abiding in suchness, fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, or that, abiding in suchness, teaches the Dharma.

original: de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na /
translated: If suchness is not apprehended,

original: de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na med @70a * //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na med @70a * //
translated: Abiding in suchness and abiding in suchness, they will attain the unsurpassed🔽

original: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: how could there be any abiding in suchness, or any full awakening to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening while abiding in suchness, or any teaching of the Dharma while abiding in suchness?

original: de ni gnas med do zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: de ni gnas med do zhes zer ba ni /
translated: That is not possible.”

original: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //🔽de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de de bzhin no // de de bzhin te /
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: ji skad smras pa bzhin no //🔽rab 'byor gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa bzhin no // rab 'byor gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas te /
translated: It is just as you have said!🔽Subhūti, there is no dharma whatsoever other than suchness that abides in suchness, or that, having abided in suchness,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid las ma gtogs par gzhan dmigs su med de /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid las ma gtogs par gzhan dmigs su med de /
translated: fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, or that, having abided in suchness, teaches the Dharma.

original: de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na /
translated: If even suchness is not apprehended,🔽how could there be anyone who stands in suchness, or who, standing in suchness, fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, or who, standing in suchness, teaches the Dharma?

original: gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do //
analyzed: gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do //
translated: That is not possible.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste /🔽chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid de ni gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste / chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid de ni gnas pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, whether or not tathāgatas arise,🔽the suchness of dharmas, the unmistaken suchness, the unaltered suchness, and the true nature of dharmas remain.

original: chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas pa nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni gnas pa ste /
analyzed: chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas pa nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni gnas pa ste /
translated: The dharma-constituent of dharmas, the establishment of dharmas, the certification of dharmas, and the very limit of reality remain.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin nyid 'di la ni gang yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin nyid 'di la ni gang yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de /
translated: Subhūti, in this suchness, there is no one who abides.

original: de la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba su yang med na /
analyzed: de la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba su yang med na /
translated: There is no one who, abiding in it, fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: de la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te /
translated: How could there be anyone who, abiding in it, teaches the Dharma?🔽That is not possible.

original: de ni gnas med do zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i gang zag btags par yod pa la brten pa'i 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa yin no /
analyzed: de ni gnas med do zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i gang zag btags par yod pa la brten pa'i 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa yin no /
translated: This is the second concept of grasping that is based on the imputed individual āryas.

original: // / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: // / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sgyu ma lta bu'i sems bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba @70b lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sgyu ma lta bu'i sems bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba @70b lags /
translated: “Blessed One, how will a mind that is like an illusion fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
translated: Do you see that mind which is like an illusion?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One, I do not.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sgyu ma yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sgyu ma yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: Blessed One, I do not see an illusion.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see a mind which is like an illusion.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: gang la sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i sems gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam mam /
analyzed: gang la sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i sems gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam mam /
translated: Do you think that a mind which you do not see—a mind which is an illusion or a mind which is like an illusion—will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so //
translated: He replied, “Blessed One, it will not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gzhan du chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngam /
analyzed: sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gzhan du chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngam /
translated: “Have you not seen any dharma at all that would fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening apart from an illusion and an illusory mind?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One, I have not.

original: bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gzhan du chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gzhan du chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Blessed One, I have not seen any dharma at all that would fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening apart from an illusion and an illusory mind.”

original: bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chos gzhan yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na mchis pa'ang ma mchis pa'i chos gang zhig bdag gis bstan par bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chos gzhan yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na mchis pa'ang ma mchis pa'i chos gang zhig bdag gis bstan par bgyi /
translated: “Blessed One, if I have not seen any other dharma at all, what nonexisting dharma should I teach?”

original: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni mchis pa'am /
analyzed: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni mchis pa'am /
translated: “Any dharma that is isolated is not realized as existing or

original: ma mchis par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: ma mchis par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro ;
translated: not existing.”

original: / chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
analyzed: / chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
translated: “A dharma that is utterly void does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ma mchis pa'i chos ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: ma mchis pa'i chos ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: A nonexistent dharma does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Why is that?🔽Blessed One, it is because all dharmas that would be defiled

original: rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad ni ma mchis shing yang dag par ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad ni ma mchis shing yang dag par ma mchis pa'o //
translated: or purified do not exist and are not real.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Blessed One, it is because the perfection of wisdom is utterly void.

original: bsam gtan gyi @71a * //🔽pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi @71a * // pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration🔽is utterly void.🔽The perfection of perseverance

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: is utterly void.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is utterly isolated.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is utterly isolated.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o ;
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o ;
translated: The perfection of generosity is utterly isolated.

original: / nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: / nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Inner emptiness is utterly isolated.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is utterly isolated.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness, right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and eightfold noble path are utterly isolated.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The noble truths, dhyānas, immeasurable aspirations, and formless absorptions are utterly isolated.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the liberations, the right concentrations, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness are void;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways are void;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are void;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects is void.

original: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bsgom par bgyi ba yang ma lags /
analyzed: chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bsgom par bgyi ba yang ma lags /
translated: Any dharma that is void is not something to be cultivated,

original: bsgom pa rnam par 'jig par bgyi ba yang ma lags te /
analyzed: bsgom pa rnam par 'jig par bgyi ba yang ma lags te /
translated: and it is not something to be destroyed by cultivation.

original: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa'i slad du chos gang yang sgrub pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa'i slad du chos gang yang sgrub pa ma mchis so //
translated: because of the extreme voidness of the perfection of wisdom, there is no establishment of any dharma at all.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa lags na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa lags na /
translated: “The perfection of wisdom is extremely void.

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten zhing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten zhing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
translated: How, then, do bodhisattva great beings, having relied on the perfection of wisdom, fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub shin tu dben pa lags na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub shin tu dben pa lags na /
translated: Unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is extremely void.

original: @71b ji ltar na dben pas dben pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: @71b ji ltar na dben pas dben pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: How, then, does voidness awaken to voidness?”

original: rab 'byor legs so legs so //🔽rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor legs so legs so // rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
translated: The Lord said, “Excellent, excellent, Subhūti!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: Subhūti, it is so, it is so.

original: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom is extremely void.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ; brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ; brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditative stability, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of generosity are utterly isolated.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Inner emptiness is utterly isolated.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is utterly isolated.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the eightfold noble path are utterly isolated.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: the concentrations, the immeasurables, and the formless absorptions are extremely isolated.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: The deliverances, the serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness are extremely isolated.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang /
translated: The clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, great love,

original: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are extremely isolated.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: Up to the knowledge of all aspects is extremely isolated.

original: rab 'byor ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: “Subhūti, it is because the perfection of wisdom is utterly isolated,🔽the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams @72a * //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams @72a * //
translated: and the perfection of giving are utterly isolated, and because inner emptiness is utterly isolated, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is utterly isolated, and the applications of mindfulness are utterly isolated,

original: shin tu dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du shin tu dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du shin tu dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: and up to the noble eightfold path is utterly isolated, and up to the knowledge of all aspects is utterly isolated, in the same way, unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is utterly isolated.

original: rab 'byor gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: rab 'byor gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: “Subhūti, if the perfection of wisdom had not been utterly isolated,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: if the perfection of concentration, perfection of perseverance, perfection of patience, perfection of morality, and perfection of giving had not been utterly isolated,

original: nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: if inner emptiness had not been utterly isolated,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not isolated,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: the applications of mindfulness are not isolated,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du shin tu dben par ma gyur /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du shin tu dben par ma gyur /
translated: up to the noble eightfold path is not isolated,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben par ma gyur na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben par ma gyur na /
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects is not isolated,

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then that is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That is not the perfection of concentration, perfection of perseverance, perfection of patience, perfection of morality, or perfection of giving.

original: de nang stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nang stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That is not the emptiness of internal phenomena,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That is not the applications of mindfulness,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the noble eightfold path will not come about,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects will not come about.

original: rab 'byor de bas na ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bas na ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: “Therefore, Subhūti, just as the perfection of wisdom is very secluded, and just as the perfection of concentration, perfection of perseverance, perfection of patience,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa dang /
translated: perfection of morality, and perfection of giving are very secluded, and just as inner emptiness is very secluded, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is very secluded,

original: ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du shin tu dben @72b pa dang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya /
analyzed: ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du shin tu dben @72b pa dang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu dben pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya /
translated: “As the four applications of mindfulness are very isolated, and in the same way, up to the eightfold noble path is very isolated, and as the knowledge of all aspects is very isolated, without depending on the perfection of wisdom one does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dben pas dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
analyzed: dben pas dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
translated: Isolation does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bas na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bas na /
translated: Because one does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: without depending on the perfection of wisdom one does not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o //
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord, bodhisattva great beings practice the profound meaning.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //🔽de de bzhin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de de bzhin no // de de bzhin te /
translated: Subhuti, it is just as you have said.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o //🔽rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar don zab mo la spyod cing 'di lta ste /🔽nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar don zab mo la spyod cing 'di lta ste / nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, practices the profound meaning.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gro ba'i don de mngon du mi byed pa ni dka' ba byed pa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gro ba'i don de mngon du mi byed pa ni dka' ba byed pa'o //
translated: Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, practicing the profound meaning in this way, does not actualize that meaning, namely, the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas. This is the difficult practice.🔽The Lord said, Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, practicing the profound meaning in this way, does not actualize that meaning, namely, the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas. This is the difficult practice.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na dka' cung zad kyang mi bgyid na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba bgyid pa lags /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na dka' cung zad kyang mi bgyid na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba bgyid pa lags / de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, practicing the profound meaning in this way, does not actualize that meaning, namely, the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas. This is the difficult practice.🔽Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, practicing the profound meaning in this way, does not actualize that meaning, namely, the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas. This is the difficult practice.🔽Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, practicing the profound meaning in this way, does not actualize that meaning, namely, the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas. This is the difficult practice.🔽Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, practicing the profound meaning in this way, does not actualize that meaning, namely, the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas. This is the difficult practice.🔽Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, practicing the profound meaning in this way, does not actualize that meaning, namely, the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas. This is the difficult practice.

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang mngon du bgyi ba'i don de yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang mngon du bgyi ba'i don de yang mi dmigs /
translated: Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, practicing the profound meaning in this way, does not actualize that meaning, namely, the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas. This is

original: gang gis mngon du bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: gang gis mngon du bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmigs /
translated: That perfection of wisdom by which one should realize, that also is not apprehended.

original: gang gi don du bgyi ba'i chos de yang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gang gi don du bgyi ba'i chos de yang mi dmigs te /
translated: That Dharma for the sake of which one should realize, that also is not apprehended.

original: bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad mngon du bgyis pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu yang gang zhig mchis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad mngon du bgyis pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu yang gang zhig mchis /
translated: Blessed One, what is that realization which, by realizing all dharmas, one will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gang zhig gis mngon du bgyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gang zhig gis mngon du bgyi /
translated: What is that perfection of wisdom by which one should realize?

original: chos mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu yang gang zhig mchis /
analyzed: chos mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu yang gang zhig mchis /
translated: What is that realization of Dharma?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa ste /
translated: Blessed One, this is the practice of nonapprehension.

original: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mun pa ma mchis pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mun pa ma mchis pa thob pa'o //
translated: A bodhisattva great being who practices like this attains the absence of darkness with regard to all dharmas.”

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te de skad du bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum /🔽yongs su mi @73a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te de skad du bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum / yongs su mi @73a * //
translated: when taught in this way,🔽do not tense up,

original: 'jum zhing / mi 'jigs /
analyzed: 'jum zhing / mi 'jigs /
translated: and are not frightened,

original: mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur na /
translated: terrified, or become filled with dread,

original: bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste /
translated: then, Blessed One, the bodhisattva great beings practicing in that way practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ni spyod do zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: de ni spyod do zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see ‘I am practicing.’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the perfection of wisdom.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see ‘I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gis nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bsring bar bya ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gis nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bsring bar bya ste /
translated: Subhuti: The Bodhisattva, the great being, who courses in perfect wisdom, does not think thus: 'I will extend the level of the Disciples and Pratyekabuddhas,🔽and I will approach the knowledge of all modes.'

original: bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur to snyam du mi bgyid do zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa yin no /
analyzed: bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur to snyam du mi bgyid do zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa yin no /
translated: This is the natural conceptualization.

original: // / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni 'di ltar bdag ni la la dang ni ring ngo //
analyzed: // / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni 'di ltar bdag ni la la dang ni ring ngo //
translated: The Lord: Just as space does not think, 'I am near to this, far from that,'

original: la la dang ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: la la dang ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: so also, Subhuti, the perfection of wisdom does not think, 'I am near to this, far from that.'

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' la bye brag ma mchis shing mi g-yo ba dang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' la bye brag ma mchis shing mi g-yo ba dang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste /
translated: Because space is without distinctions, without wavering, without conceptualization.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang 'di ltar bdag la nyan thos sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang 'di ltar bdag la nyan thos sam /
translated: “Blessed One, in the same way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not think, ‘The levels of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas are far away,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring gi / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring gi / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is near.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?🔽Blessed One, it is because the perfection of wisdom is nonconceptual.”

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi rnam par rtog pa yin no /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi rnam par rtog pa yin no /
translated: This is the conception of family.

original: // / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni 'di ltar bdag las sgyu ma ni ring ngo //
analyzed: // / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni 'di ltar bdag las sgyu ma ni ring ngo //
translated: “Blessed One, for example, an illusory person does not think, ‘The illusion is far away from me,

original: sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni nye'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni nye'o //
translated: and the magician is near.

original: skye bo'i tshogs 'di ltar 'dus pa ni bdag las ring ngo zhe'am /
analyzed: skye bo'i tshogs 'di ltar 'dus pa ni bdag las ring ngo zhe'am /
translated: This crowd of people is far away from me,

original: nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: and I am near.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du ste /🔽bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du ste / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam /
translated: The Blessed One, the illusory person is nonconceptual.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //
translated: Blessed One, in the same way, the bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom does not think, “The śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level is far away.

original: bla na med pa yang @73b dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang @73b dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: Unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is near.”

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?🔽Blessed One, it is because the perfection of wisdom is nonconceptual.

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sgrub pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sgrub pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
translated: This is the conceptualization of correct practice.

original: // / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: // / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Blessed One, it is like this:

original: gzugs brnyan ni 'di ltar bdag las dmigs pa gang gis gzugs brnyan 'byung ba de ni nye la /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan ni 'di ltar bdag las dmigs pa gang gis gzugs brnyan 'byung ba de ni nye la /
translated: A reflection does not think, “The object from which the reflection arises is near.

original: gang me long dang snod chus gang ba'i nang du 'byung ba de ni bdag las ring ngo zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: gang me long dang snod chus gang ba'i nang du 'byung ba de ni bdag las ring ngo zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: “What appears in a mirror or in a vessel filled with pure oil or water is not thought to be far away from it.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du ste /🔽bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang 'di ltar bdag la nyan thos sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du ste / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang 'di ltar bdag la nyan thos sam /
translated: Because, Blessed One, a reflection is nonconceptual.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //
translated: In the same way, Blessed One, a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom does not think, ‘The śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level is far away from me,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //
translated: but unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is near.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na ;
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na ;
translated: Why is that?🔽Because, Blessed One, the perfection of wisdom is nonconceptual.”

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
translated: This is the conceptualization of objects.

original: // / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: // / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Blessed One, it is as follows:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so //
translated: The Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One has nothing to do with what is attractive or unattractive.🔽Blessed One, in the same way, the perfection of wisdom has nothing to do with what is attractive or unattractive.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa yin no //🔽bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang ba ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa yin no //🔽bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang ba ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
