analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yid la ma bgyis /
translated: do not pay attention to the constituents, elements, or dependent origination,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yid la ma bgyis /
translated: do not pay attention to all the perfections, all the emptinesses, or the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: do not pay attention to the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo yid la ma bgyis /
translated: the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signless meditative stabilization, the wishless meditative stabilization,🔽the doors of liberation, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions,

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad yid la ma bgyis /
translated: the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yid la ma bgyis par dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji ltar rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yid la ma bgyis par dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji ltar rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur /
translated: up to and the knowledge of all aspects, how can wholesome roots increase?

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par ma 'phel bar yang ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par ma 'phel bar yang ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
translated: How can the perfections be completed without wholesome roots increasing?

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su ma rdzogs par yang ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su ma rdzogs par yang ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur /
translated: How can the knowledge of all aspects be attained without the perfections being completed?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor nam gzugs yid la mi byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor nam gzugs yid la mi byed /
translated: “Subhūti, when you do not pay attention to form,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed /
translated: He does not pay attention to feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yid la mi byed /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yid la mi byed /
translated: He does not pay attention to the sense fields, the elements, or dependent origination.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yid la mi byed /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yid la mi byed /
translated: He does not pay attention to all the perfections, all the emptinesses, or the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa @80b nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa @80b nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: He does not pay attention to the noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless meditative absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon par med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la mi byed /
analyzed: smon par med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la mi byed /
translated: or aspirationlessness, the higher cognitions, the meditative stabilities, or the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad yid la mi byed /
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad yid la mi byed /
translated: He does not pay attention to the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, or the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yid la mi byed na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yid la mi byed na /
translated: He does not pay attention up to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te /

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par 'phel bas /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par 'phel bas /
translated: Because the wholesome roots increase,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the six perfections are completed.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the six perfections are completed, the knowledge of all aspects is attained.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

analyzed: gzugs yid la ma byas /
translated: it is because he does not pay attention to form,

analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yid la ma byas /

translated: He did not pay attention to the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la ma byas /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la ma byas /
translated: or wishlessness. He did not pay attention to the higher knowledges, the meditative stabilizations, or the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad yid la ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /🔽// / gsol pa /
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad yid la ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no / // / gsol pa /
translated: “One awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening without paying attention to the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.”

original: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de ltar gzugs yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de ltar gzugs yid la ma bgyis /
translated: Subhūti said, “Lord, why is it that one does not pay attention to form like that,

original: de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /🔽de ltar skye mched dang / @81a * //
analyzed: de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis / de ltar skye mched dang / @81a * //
translated: why does one not pay attention to feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness like that,

original: khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yid la ma bgyis /
translated: why does one not pay attention to the constituents, the sense fields, or dependent origination like that,

original: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yid la ma bgyis /
translated: why does one not pay attention to all the perfections, all the emptinesses, or the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening like that,

original: de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
analyzed: de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la ma bgyis /
translated: emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de ltar stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid la ma bgyis par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro /🔽// / bam po lnga bcu drug pa /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid la ma bgyis par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro / // / bam po lnga bcu drug pa /
translated: Without paying attention to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, they will attain the knowledge of all aspects.”🔽The Lord said,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “Subhūti, it is so, it is so.

original: yid la byed pas ni gal te 'dod pa'i khams sam /
analyzed: yid la byed pas ni gal te 'dod pa'i khams sam /
translated: By mental activity, one becomes involved in the desire realm,

original: gal te gzugs kyi khams sam /
analyzed: gal te gzugs kyi khams sam /
translated: in the form realm,

original: gal te gzugs med pa'i khams su 'dre bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gzugs med pa'i khams su 'dre bar 'gyur te /
translated: and in the formless realm.

original: yid la mi byed pas ni gang du'ang 'dre bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid la mi byed pas ni gang du'ang 'dre bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: By not mentally engaging, one does not become involved anywhere.

original: de bas na rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de bas na rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Therefore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,🔽they should not become involved with any dharma at all.

original: chos gang dang yang 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni khams gsum char dang 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
analyzed: chos gang dang yang 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni khams gsum char dang 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
translated: This is the conceptualization that is related to all three realms.

original: // / gsol pa /
analyzed: // / gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa de gang la gnas par 'gyur /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa de gang la gnas par 'gyur /
translated: “Blessed One, where do bodhisattva great beings who practice the perfection of wisdom like that stand?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who practice like that do not stand in form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not stand in feeling, perception, volitional formations, or consciousness.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la gnas par mi @81b 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la gnas par mi @81b 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not stand in the sense realms, elements, or dependent origination.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not stand in the perfections, the emptinesses, or the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: They do not stand in the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: or wishlessness. They do not stand in the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, or the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ; so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ; so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, or the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽They will not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
translated: This is the conception of standing.

original: // / gsol pa /
analyzed: // / gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang gnas par mi 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang gnas par mi 'gyur ba lags /
translated: “Why, Lord, will they not stand even in the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir gang la yang gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir gang la yang gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: “Because they do not settle down on anything.”

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar de gang la mngon par chags par bya ba'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar de gang la mngon par chags par bya ba'am /
translated: Why is that?

original: gnas par bya ba'o chos lta bu gang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: gnas par bya ba'o chos lta bu gang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: Because they do not see any dharma at all on which they could settle down or stand.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par chags pa med pa dang / gnas med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba ni dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par chags pa med pa dang / gnas med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba ni dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
translated: This is the conceptualization of clinging to things.

original: // / gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing gang de ltar spyod pa dang / de ltar bsgom pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
analyzed: // / gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing gang de ltar spyod pa dang / de ltar bsgom pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
translated: If the bodhisattva great being thinks, “Whoever practices and meditates like that practices the perfection of wisdom,

original: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom ste /
analyzed: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom ste /
translated: meditates on the perfection of wisdom,

original: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
analyzed: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod /
translated: I practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom mo snyam shing gal te de ltar 'du shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom mo snyam shing gal te de ltar 'du shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du byed pa yin no //
translated: I meditate on the perfection of wisdom,” and if they perceive it like that, they are far from the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur ba de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi @82a * //
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur ba de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi @82a * //
translated: Whoever is far from the perfection of wisdom is far from the perfection of meditative stability,🔽the perfection of perseverance,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur ba yin no //
translated: the perfection of patience, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of generosity.

original: nang stong pa nyid las ring du gyur ba yin /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid las ring du gyur ba yin /
translated: They are far from the emptiness of internal phenomena,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyis stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du gyur ba yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyis stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du gyur ba yin /
translated: and they are far from the other aspects of emptiness, up to and including the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽They are far from the applications of mindfulness,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the eightfold noble path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /🔽mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo las ring du gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo las ring du gyur ba yin no //
translated: They are far from the four noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the deliverances, the complete liberations, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad las ring du gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad las ring du gyur ba yin no //
translated: They are far from the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ba las ring du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ba las ring du gyur pa yin no //
translated: They are far from the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la yang mngon par chags par mi byed de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la yang mngon par chags par mi byed de /
translated: Because the perfection of wisdom does not cause one to settle down on anything at all.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa gang yang med do //
translated: There is no attachment whatsoever to the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhes na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhes na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar gang la mngon par chags par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i rang bzhi de la med de /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gang la mngon par chags par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i rang bzhi de la med de /
translated: Because that intrinsic nature does not exist in that way, in which there would be attachment.

original: rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams par 'gyur te /
translated: Subhūti, if bodhisattva great beings have the notion of the perfection of wisdom, then those bodhisattva great beings have fallen from the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa de ni chos thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa de ni chos thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who have fallen from the perfection of wisdom have fallen from all dharmas.

original: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol @82b tu phyin pa las yongs su nyams🔽par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol @82b tu phyin pa las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If he thinks, “The perfection of wisdom takes hold of the five perfections,” then that bodhisattva great being has fallen away from the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: If he thinks, “The perfection of wisdom takes hold of the emptiness of internal,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,” then that bodhisattva great being has fallen away from the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: If he thinks, “The perfection of wisdom takes hold of the four applications of mindfulness,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no //
translated: If he thinks, ‘The perfection of wisdom takes hold of the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom, the emptiness of the perfection of concentration, the emptiness of the perfection of perseverance, the emptiness of the perfection of patience, the emptiness of the perfection of morality, and the emptiness of the perfection of giving,’ then that bodhisattva great being has fallen away from the perfection of wisdom.🔽If he thinks, ‘The perfection of wisdom takes hold of the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom, the emptiness of the perfection of concentration, the emptiness of the perfection of perseverance, the emptiness of the perfection of patience, the emptiness of the perfection of morality, the emptiness of the perfection of giving, the emptiness of the four applications of mindfulness, and the emptiness of the four right efforts,🔽the emptiness of the four legs of miraculous power, the emptiness of the five faculties, the emptiness of the five powers, the emptiness of the seven limbs of awakening, and the emptiness of the eightfold noble path,

original: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of the ten powers of a tathāgata, the emptiness of the four fearlessnesses, the emptiness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the emptiness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, the emptiness of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, and the emptiness of the three gateways to liberation,🔽the emptiness of the emptiness gateway to liberation, the emptiness of the signless gateway to liberation, and the emptiness of the wishless gateway to liberation,🔽the emptiness of the ten tathāgata powers, the emptiness of the four fearlessnesses, the emptiness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the emptiness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, the emptiness of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, and the emptiness of the three gateways to liberation,🔽the emptiness of the emptiness gateway to liberation, the emptiness of the signless gateway to liberation, and the emptiness of the wishless gateway to liberation,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
translated: the emptiness of the ten tathāgata powers, the emptiness of the four fearlessnesses, the emptiness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the emptiness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, the emptiness of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, and the emptiness of the three gateways to liberation,🔽the emptiness of the emptiness

original: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //🔽gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
analyzed: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no // gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su 'dzin to snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
translated: If he thinks, “The perfection of wisdom holds the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,” then that bodhisattva great being has fallen from the perfection of wisdom.

original: nyams pa yin no ;
analyzed: nyams pa yin no ;
translated: If he thinks, “The perfection of wisdom holds up to the knowledge of all aspects,” then that bodhisattva great being has fallen from the perfection of wisdom.

original: / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nas so //
analyzed: / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nas so //
translated: And without the perfection of wisdom, one cannot fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to snyam na @83a * //
analyzed: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to snyam na @83a * //
translated: If, on the other hand, he thinks, ‘One who abides in this perfection of wisdom is prophesied to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment,’

original: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin te /
analyzed: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin te /
translated: then that bodhisattva great being has fallen away from the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi ston to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi ston to //
translated: And one who has fallen away from the perfection of wisdom is not prophesied to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: “Moreover, if he thinks, ‘I will stand in the perfection of wisdom and accomplish the perfection of giving of the bodhisattva great beings,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub po //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub po //
translated: accomplish the perfection of morality, perfection of patience, perfection of perseverance, perfection of concentration, and perfection of wisdom,

original: nang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: accomplish inner emptiness,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: up to accomplish the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: accomplish the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: He accomplishes the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: He accomplishes the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the deliverances, the sequential absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: and wishlessness, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu brgyad mngon par bsgrub bo snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu brgyad mngon par bsgrub bo snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
translated: If he thinks, ‘I will fully achieve the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,’ then that bodhisattva great being has lost this perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
translated: Because, having lost the perfection of wisdom, he is unable to accomplish the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @83b bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @83b bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
translated: He is unable to accomplish the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
translated: they are unable to accomplish the emptiness of internal phenomena,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
translated: up to they are unable to accomplish the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
translated: They are unable to accomplish the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
translated: they are unable to accomplish the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: They are unable to accomplish the noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless absorptions, the formless meditative attainments, the gateways of meditative stability, the gateways of meditative absorption, the emptiness gateway to meditative stability,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
translated: they are unable to accomplish the emptiness meditative stabilization, the signless meditative stabilization, the wishless meditative stabilization, the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the limbs of awakening, and the path;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
translated: they are unable to accomplish the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub par mi nus so //
translated: they are unable to accomplish the knowledge of all aspects, great love, and great compassion;

original: gal te yang de 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ste /
analyzed: gal te yang de 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ste /
translated: and if they think, ‘The Tathāgata has not fully grasped any dharma,

original: rang gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad po //
analyzed: rang gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad po //
translated: but has taught it after awakening to it himself,

original: bstan to // rab tu phye'o snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: bstan to // rab tu phye'o snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
translated: has revealed it, and has made it clear,’ then those bodhisattva great beings have fallen from the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med de /
translated: Subhūti, the Tathāgata has not fully awakened to any dharma at all.

original: rab 'byor de yang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos gang yang 'dogs pa med na /
analyzed: rab 'byor de yang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos gang yang 'dogs pa med na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this: if the Tathāgata has not designated any dharma at all,

original: chos la la zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de /
analyzed: chos la la zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de /
translated: how could it be that he has not fully awakened to any dharma at all?🔽That is not possible.”

original: de ni gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba ni dngos por btags par rnam par rtog pa yin no /
analyzed: de ni gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba ni dngos por btags par rnam par rtog pa yin no /
translated: This is the conceptualization of the designation of entities.

original: // / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di @84a * //🔽skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: // / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di @84a * // skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i skyon 'di dag ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i skyon 'di dag ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: “Lord, how will bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom avoid these faults?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should train in the perfection of wisdom like this: ‘Form is empty of form.

original: rab 'byor nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni med pa ste yongs su ma bzung ba'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni med pa ste yongs su ma bzung ba'o //
translated: “Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom think, ‘All phenomena are nonexistent and ungrasped,

original: de ltar chos thams cad med cing yongs su ma bzung ba ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad med cing yongs su ma bzung ba ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te /
translated: and thus all phenomena, being nonexistent and ungrasped, cannot be fully awakened to,’

original: gal te de ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te de ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no //
translated: if they practice in that way, they are practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: dal te de ltar yongs su ma bzung ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par chags na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba yin te ;
analyzed: dal te de ltar yongs su ma bzung ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par chags na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba yin te ;
translated: If they thus become attached to all phenomena, which are ungrasped, bodhisattva great beings are separated from the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par chags pas brjod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par chags pas brjod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
translated: This is the conceptualization of attachment.

original: // / gsol pa /🔽bcom ldan 'das ci lags /
analyzed: // / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ci lags /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba lags sam /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba lags sam /
translated: “Blessed One, is the perfection of wisdom not separated from the perfection of wisdom?

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bra ba lags sam /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bra ba lags sam /
translated: Is the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, and the perfection of generosity not separated from the perfection of generosity?

original: nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid dang ma bral ba lags sam /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid dang ma bral ba lags sam /
translated: Is inner emptiness not separated from inner emptiness?

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ma bra ba lags sam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ma bra ba lags sam /
translated: Are the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities inseparable from the emptiness of emptiness up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities?

original: dran pa nye par gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang ma bral ba lags sam /
analyzed: dran pa nye par gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang ma bral ba lags sam /
translated: Are the applications of mindfulness inseparable from the applications of mindfulness?

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ma bral ba lags sam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ma bral ba lags sam /
translated: Are the correct exertions, the supports for miraculous ability, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path inseparable from the noble eightfold path?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam @84b gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stang pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam @84b gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stang pa nyid dang /
translated: Are the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gateways to liberation, and the emptiness of emptiness, up to the emptiness of its own mark, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, and the ultimate emptiness inseparable from the ultimate emptiness?

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang ma bral ba lags sam /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang ma bral ba lags sam /
translated: Are the applications of mindfulness, the correct exertions, the supports for miraculous ability, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path not separated from the noble eightfold path?🔽Are the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha not separated from the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha?🔽Are all the aspects of emptiness, up to and including the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, not separated from the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?🔽Are all the aspects of the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, up to and including the noble eightfold path, not separated from the noble eightfold path?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad sangs rgyas kyi chas ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad dang ma bral ba lags sam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad sangs rgyas kyi chas ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad dang ma bral ba lags sam /
translated: Are the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha not separated from the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha?🔽Are all the aspects of emptiness, up to and including the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, not separated from the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba lags sam /🔽gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba lags sam /🔽gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral /
translated: Are all the aspects of the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, up to and including the noble eightfold path, not separated from the noble eightfold path?

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral /
translated: the perfection of meditative stability, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of generosity are not separate from the perfection of generosity,🔽up to and the knowledge of all aspects are not separate from the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba zhig lags na ni zhes bya ba ni gnyen po la rnam par rtog pa yin no /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba zhig lags na ni zhes bya ba ni gnyen po la rnam par rtog pa yin no /
translated: This is the conception of an antidote.

original: // /'o na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: // /'o na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: “Well then, how should the perfection of wisdom be accomplished?”

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should they practice the perfection of meditative stabilization, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, and the perfection of giving?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should they practice up to the knowledge of all aspects?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom🔽do not settle down on ‘this is form,’ or ‘this is the perfection of form.’🔽They do not settle down on ‘this is feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,’ or ‘this is the perfection of consciousness.’

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: They do not settle down on ‘this is the perfection of form,’ or ‘this is the perfection of form.’🔽They do not settle down on ‘this is feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,’ or ‘this is the perfection of consciousness.’

original: gzugs she'am / 'di ni gzugs so //
analyzed: gzugs she'am / 'di ni gzugs so //
translated: They do not settle down on ‘this is the perfection of form,’ or ‘this is the perfection of form.’🔽They do not settle down on ‘this is feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,’ or ‘this is the perfection of consciousness.’🔽They do not settle down on ‘this is the perfection of form,’ or ‘this is the perfection of form.’🔽They do not settle down on ‘this is feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,’ or ‘this is the perfection of consciousness.’🔽They do not settle down on ‘this is the perfection of form,’ or ‘this is the perfection of form.’🔽They do not settle down on ‘this is feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,’ or ‘this is the perfection of consciousness.’🔽They do not settle down on ‘this is the perfection of form,’ or ‘this is the perfection of form.’🔽They do not settle down on ‘this is feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,’ or ‘this is the perfection of consciousness.’🔽They do not settle down on ‘this is the perfection of form,’ or ‘this is the perfection of form.’🔽They do not settle down on ‘this is feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,’ or ‘this is the perfection of consciousness.’

original: 'di ni gzugs so zhes bya bar mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'di ni gzugs so zhes bya bar mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on ‘this is the perfection of form,’ or ‘this is the perfection of form.’🔽They do not settle down on ‘this is feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,’ or ‘this is the perfection of consciousness.’

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam @85a * //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam @85a * //
translated: They do not settle down on ‘this is the perfection of form,’ or ‘this

original: par shes pa zhe'am 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o 'di'i rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya bar mngon par chags pa mes so //
analyzed: par shes pa zhe'am 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o 'di'i rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya bar mngon par chags pa mes so //
translated: He is not attached to the idea that this is consciousness, or that this is the consciousness of that.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhe'am /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhe'am /
translated: He is not attached to the idea that this is the sense fields, elements, or dependent origination,

original: 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o //
translated: or that this is dependent origination.

original: 'di'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes bya bar mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'di'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes bya bar mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the idea that this is the dependent origination of that.🔽He is not attached to the idea that this is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar zhe'am /🔽'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar zhe'am / 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: or that this is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya bar mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'di'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya bar mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the idea that this is the knowledge of all aspects of that.

original: gzugs rtag pa'am mi rtag par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs rtag pa'am mi rtag par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the idea that form is permanent or impermanent,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa'am mi rtag par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa'am mi rtag par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: or that feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness is permanent or impermanent.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag pa'am mi rtag par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag pa'am mi rtag par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the sense spheres, elements, or dependent origination as permanent or impermanent.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag pa'am mi rtag par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag pa'am mi rtag par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: Up to they are not attached to the knowledge of all aspects as permanent or impermanent.

original: gzugs bde ba'am sdug bsngal bar mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs bde ba'am sdug bsngal bar mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to form as happiness or suffering.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde ba'am sdug bsngal bar mngon bar par chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde ba'am sdug bsngal bar mngon bar par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as happiness or suffering.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bde ba'am sdug bsngal bar mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bde ba'am sdug bsngal bar mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to the sense spheres, elements, or dependent origination as happiness or suffering.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bde ba'am sdug bsngal bar mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bde ba'am sdug bsngal bar mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: Up to they are not attached to the knowledge of all aspects as happiness or suffering.

original: gzugs bdag gam bdag med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs bdag gam bdag med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They are not attached to form as self or not self.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag gam bdag med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag gam bdag med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not settle down on the notion that feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are a self or not a self.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bdag gam bdag mes par mngon par chags pa mes do //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bdag gam bdag mes par mngon par chags pa mes do //
translated: He does not settle down on the notion that the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination are a self or not a self.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bdag gam bdag med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bdag gam bdag med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not settle down on the notion that the knowledge of all aspects is a self or not a self.

original: gzugs zhi ba'am ma zhi bar mngon par chags pa med do //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes @85b dang ; 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba'am ma zhi bar mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs zhi ba'am ma zhi bar mngon par chags pa med do // tshor ba dang / 'du shes @85b dang ; 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba'am ma zhi bar mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not settle down on the notion that form is calm or not calm.🔽He does not settle down on the notion that feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are calm or not calm.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhi ba'am ma zhi bar mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhi ba'am ma zhi bar mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not settle down on the notion that the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination are calm or not calm.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zhi ba'am ma zhi bar mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zhi ba'am ma zhi bar mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: up to and including omniscience, as peaceful or not peaceful.

original: gzugs stong pa'am mi stong bar mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs stong pa'am mi stong bar mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not get fixated on form as empty or not empty.

original: tshogs ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'am mi stong pa'am mi stong par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshogs ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'am mi stong pa'am mi stong par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not get fixated on feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as empty or not empty.

original: skye mched dang/ khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa'am mi stong par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched dang/ khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa'am mi stong par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not get fixated on the sense fields, elements, or dependent origination as empty or not empty.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa'am mi stong par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa'am mi stong par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not get fixated on , up to and including omniscience, as empty or not empty.

original: gzugs mtshan ma yod pa'am mtshan med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs mtshan ma yod pa'am mtshan med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not get fixated on form as with signs or signless.

original: tsho ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang ; rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod pa'am mtshan ma med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: tsho ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang ; rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod pa'am mtshan ma med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not get fixated on feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as with signs or signless.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mtshan ma yod pa'am mtshan med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mtshan ma yod pa'am mtshan med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the sense fields, elements, or dependent origination as having a sign or as signless.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtshan ma yod pa'am mtshan ma med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtshan ma yod pa'am mtshan ma med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on . . . up to the knowledge of all aspects as having a sign or as signless.

original: gzugs smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on form as having aspirations or as lacking aspirations.🔽They do not settle down on feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as having aspirations or as lacking aspirations.

original: skye mched dang ; khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched dang ; khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: They do not settle down on the sense fields, elements, or dependent origination as having aspirations or as lacking aspirations.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du smon pa yod pa'am smon pa med par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: up to and including the knowledge of all aspects, as having aspirations or not having aspirations.

original: gzugs dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not get caught up in the idea that form is void or not void.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not get caught up in the idea that feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness is void or not void.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He does not get caught up in the idea that the constituents, the sense fields, or dependent origination is void or not void.

original: @86a * // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: @86a * // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'am mi dben par mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: up to and including the knowledge of all aspects, as void or not void.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rang bzhin med pa'i ches ni rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i ches ni rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: Because a nonexistent essential nature of phenomena is not something that can be said to be

original: mi rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: permanent or impermanent,

original: bde zhes bya ba'am /🔽sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am /🔽bdag yod ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: bde zhes bya ba'am / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am / bdag yod ces bya ba'am /
translated: happy or suffering,🔽a self or not a self,

original: bdag med ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya ba'am /
translated: “Selflessness” or🔽

original: zhi zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba'am /
translated: “Peace” or🔽

original: ma zhi zhes bya ba'am /🔽stong zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: ma zhi zhes bya ba'am / stong zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or ‘it is not peaceful,’🔽or ‘it is empty,’

original: mi stong zhes bya ba'am /🔽mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi stong zhes bya ba'am / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am /
translated: or ‘it is not empty,’🔽or ‘it has signs,’

original: mtshan ma med ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma med ces bya ba'am /
translated: or ‘it is signless,’

original: smon pa yod ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: smon pa yod ces bya ba'am /
translated: or ‘it is having aspirations,’

original: smon pa med ces bya ba'am /🔽dben zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: smon pa med ces bya ba'am / dben zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or ‘it is without aspirations,’🔽or ‘it is isolated,’

original: mi dben zhes bya bar mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: mi dben zhes bya bar mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: or ‘it is not isolated.’

original: ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis mngon par sgrub par mi nus te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis mngon par sgrub par mi nus te /
translated: Subhūti, an intrinsic nature cannot be accomplished by an intrinsic nature.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the perfection of morality and the perfection of giving, then they will stand in the knowledge of all modes.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: For example, Subhuti,

original: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der 'gro'o //🔽rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ste /
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der 'gro'o // rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ste /
translated: the fourfold army of a universal king goes wherever the king goes.🔽In the same way, Subhuti, these five perfections follow after the perfection of wisdom, and they will stand where the knowledge of all modes stands.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro ba la thogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin te 'di dag gis ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po rnam pa dgu🔽gsungs pa yin no /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro ba la thogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin te 'di dag gis ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po rnam pa dgu🔽gsungs pa yin no /
translated: This is the first group of nine conceptions, the conceptions of the apprehended.

original: // / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: // / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: kha lo sgyur ba ni rta zung bzhi pa'i shing rta la zhon zhing lam mnyam pa nas 'gro'o //
analyzed: kha lo sgyur ba ni rta zung bzhi pa'i shing rta la zhon zhing lam mnyam pa nas 'gro'o //
translated: A charioteer, mounted on a four-horse chariot, goes along a level road.

original: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i kha lo sgyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der lam mnyam pa nas 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du
analyzed: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i kha lo sgyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der lam mnyam pa nas 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du
translated: In the same way, the charioteer of the five perfections, namely the perfection of wisdom, goes along the level road to where the knowledge of all aspects is.

original: nges par mi 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
analyzed: nges par mi 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa yin no /
translated: This is the conception of not definitely emerging.

original: // / gsol pa /
analyzed: // / gsol pa /
translated: He said:
